title: Personal Trainer's Font ID
content:
Hi there, I'm doing a little bit of pro bono work for a Personal Trainer and his designer is being really unhelpful with getting his logo over in vector format. Would be hugely grateful if anyone can quickly identify the 2 fonts in this logo for me.

Many thanks,

Jon

Font: 

 Blenda Script 

Solved By: 

 [R.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419021218/http:/typophile.com/user/57325 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [temp-logo3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419021218/http:/typophile.com/files/temp-logo3.png) | 5.57 KB |
author: jonmorse86

comments.content: ‘Achieve’ is a free font called Blenda Script; Helvetica Condensed Bold matches the subline fairly well (but it’s difficult to be sure at that size).

Hi R.

Thank you so much - really appreciate your (speedy) help. If there was a Madame Tussaud's for typographers you would surely be cast in wax!

Many thanks, Jon
